mapper.select: select isnull(callflag, '') as callflag, isnull(calluserid,'') as calluserid, isnull(calluserpw, '') as calluserpw from TB_XENV where spjangcd = 'ZZ'

SELECT substring(a.recedate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(a.recedate, 7,2) as recedate, Left(a.recedate,4) + '-' + substring(a.recedate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.recedate, 7,2) as recedateyear, Left(a.hitchdate,4) + '-' + substring(a.hitchdate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.hitchdate, 7,2) as hitchdate, Left(a.recetime,2)+ ':' + substring(a.recetime, 3,2) as recetime, Left(a.hitchhour,2)+ ':' + substring(a.hitchhour, 3,2) as hitchhour, a.recenum, a.actcd as actcd, substring(a.actnm,0,15) as actnm, a.equpcd as equpcd, a.equpnm as equpnm, a.cnt as cnt, a.ascnt as ascnt, isnull(a.pernm,'') AS actpernm, a.contcd as contcd, a.contnm as contnm, isnull(a.tel,'') as tel, a.reperid as reperid, a.repernm as repernm, a.perid as perid, a.pernm as pernm, a.handphone as handphone, a.contremark as contents, a.remark as remark, isnull(a.addrtxt,'') as addrtxt FROM ( SELECT a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.cltcd, a.actcd, a.equpcd, a.recedate, a.recenum, a.recetime, a.hitchdate, a.hitchhour, q.actnm, m.equpnm, 1 as cnt, 1 as ascnt, a.contcd, p.contnm, a.contents as contremark, a.reperid , g.pernm as repernm, a.perid, d.pernm, d.handphone, a.remark, q.tel as tel, isnull(q.anaddress, '') + ' ' + isnull(q.anaddress2, '') as addrtxt FROM tb_e401 a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e010 p WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = p.custcd AND a.spjangcd = p.spjangcd AND a.contcd = p.contcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 g WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = g.custcd AND a.spjangcd = g.spjangcd AND a.reperid = substring(g.perid, 2, 10)) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(d.perid, 2, 10)) ) a WHERE a.recedate between #{frdate} and #{todate} AND isnull(a.actnm,'') Like concat('%',#{actcd},'%') ORDER BY A.recedate desc, A.recetime desc

select distinct Z.pernm , Z.divinm, (Z.actnm) as actnm, max(Z.teltime) as teltime, max(Z.telxcoordi) as telxcoordi, max(Z.telycodrdi) as telycodrdi, Z.handphone, Left(Z.recetime,2)+ ':' + substring(Z.recetime, 3,2) as recetime, isnull(Z.addrtxt, '') as addrtxt FROM ( select A.pernm , b.divinm, '' as actnm, '' as teltime, '' as telxcoordi, '' as telycodrdi, a.handphone as handphone, '' as recetime, '' as addrtxt from tb_ja001 a with (nolock) , tb_jc002 b with (nolock) where a.divicd = b.divicd and a.rtclafi ='001' union select A.pernm , c.divinm as divinm, substring(d.actnm,0,20) AS actnm, '' as teltime, '' as telxcoordi, '' as telycodrdi, a.handphone as handphone, max(b.recetime) as recetime, isnull(d.anaddress, '') + ' ' + isnull(d.anaddress2, '') as addrtxt from tb_ja001 a with (nolock) , tb_e401 b with (nolock) , tb_jc002 c with (nolock) , tb_e601 d with (nolock) where a.perid = 'p' + b.perid and b.recedate = #{frdate} and a.divicd = c.divicd and b.actcd = d.actcd and a.rtclafi ='001' group by A.pernm , c.divinm, d.actnm, a.handphone, d.anaddress, d.anaddress2 union select A.pernm , b.divinm, '' as actnm, c.teltime, c.telxcoordi, c.telycodrdi, a.handphone as handphone, '' as recetime, '' as addrtxt from tb_ja001 a with (nolock), tb_mcoordinate c with (nolock) , tb_jc002 b with (nolock) where a.divicd = b.divicd and a.rtclafi ='001' and c.inputdate = #{frdate} and a.handphone=c.telnumber and c.teltime in (select top 1 max(teltime) from tb_mcoordinate where inputdate = #{frdate} group by inputdate ) ) Z
group by Z.pernm , Z.divinm , Z.handphone , Z.actnm, Z.recetime, Z.addrtxt order by Z.pernm

SELECT SUM(Z.callcount) AS callcount, SUM(Z.recenum) as rececnt, SUM(Z.callback) as callback, SUM(Z.compnum) as compcnt FROM ( SELECT '0' as flag, COUNT(*) AS callcount, 0 as recenum, 0 as callback, 0 as compnum FROM TB_CALLMAIN WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CALLDATE = #{frdate} UNION SELECT '0' as flag, 0 AS callcount, COUNT(*) as recenum, 0 as callback, 0 as compnum FROM TB_E401 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RECEDATE = #{frdate} UNION SELECT '0' as flag, 0 AS callcount, 0 as recenum, COUNT(*) as callback, 0 as compnum FROM TB_CALLMAIN WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CALLDATE = #{frdate} AND RCVFLAG = 'Y' UNION SELECT '0' as flag, 0 AS callcount, 0 as recenum, 0 as callback, COUNT(*) as compnum FROM TB_E411 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE compdate = #{frdate} ) Z GROUP BY Z.flag

select seq , Left(calldate,4) + '-' + substring(calldate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(calldate, 7,2) as calldate, Left(calltime,2)+ ':' + substring(calltime, 3,2) as calltime, callnum, callnm, pernm, regdate, recedate, recenum , substring(calldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(calldate, 7,2) as subcalldate, Left(calltime,2)+ ':' + substring(calltime, 3,2) as subcalltime, flag, callmemo, rcvflag, callendmemo, callbackflag, callbacktime, callbackmemo from tb_callmain with (nolock) where calldate = #{frdate} and isnull(callnm,'') Like concat('%',#{actcd},'%') order by calltime desc
select max(recenum) from tb_e401 where recedate = #{recedate}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_e401 (custcd, spjangcd, recenum, recedate, recetime, hitchdate, hitchhour, actcd, equpcd, contcd, contents, remark, perid, reperid, inperid, indate) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{recenum}, #{recedate}, #{recetime}, #{hitchdate}, #{hitchhour}, #{actcd}, #{equpcd}, #{contcd}, #{contents}, #{remark}, #{perid}, #{reperid}, #{inperid}, #{indate})
mapper.delete: delete from tb_e401 where recedate = #{recedate} and recenum=#{recenum}
mapper.select: select max(seq) from tb_callmain where left(seq,6) = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_callmain ( calldate, calltime, seq, callnm, callnum, regdate, callmemo, callbackflag, callbacktime, callbackmemo, pernm, callendmemo ) values (#{calldate}, #{calltime}, #{seq}, #{callnm}, #{callnum}, #{regdate}, #{callmemo}, #{callbackflag}, #{callbacktime}, #{callbackmemo}, #{pernm}, #{callendmemo})
mapper.select: select max(msgid) from tb_e401_sms WITH (NOLOCK) where Left(msgid,6) = #{recedate}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_e401_sms ( custcd, spjangcd, receipdate, recedate, recenum, cltcd, actcd, equpcd, perid, sms_ip, sms_port, sms_id, sms_ps, sms_tel, sms_num, sms_caller, sms_text, result, pernm, reperid, repernm, flag, msgid ) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, getdate(), #{smsrecedate}, #{smsrecenum}, null, #{smsactcd}, #{smsequpcd}, null, #{smsip}, #{smsport}, #{smsid} , #{smsps} , #{smstel} , #{smshandphone}, #{smscaller}, #{smstext} , #{smsresult}, #{smspernm} , null, #{smsrepernm} , '1', #{smsmsgid} )
mapper.select: select TOP 50 substring(convert(varchar(8), receipdate, 112), 5,2) + '/' + substring(convert(varchar(8), receipdate, 112), 7,2) as recedate, convert(varchar(8), receipdate, 114) as recetime, pernm, sms_tel, repernm, sms_caller, sms_text, result, flag from tb_e401_sms with (nolock) where Left( convert(varchar(8), receipdate, 112) , 4) = #{yyyymm} and isnull(pernm,'') Like concat('%',#{pernm},'%') order by receipdate desc
select actmail from TB_E601CALL A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_E601CALL_01 B WITH (NOLOCK) where a.actcd = b.actcd AND b.tel in (#{callnum})
mapper.insert: insert into TB_E601CALL ( custcd, spjangcd, actcd, seq, tel, actmail, regdate, regflag) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{actcd}, #{seq}, #{tel}, #{actmail}, #{regdate}, '3' )
insert into TB_E601CALL_01 ( custcd, spjangcd, actcd, seq, tel, indate ) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{actcd}, #{seq}, #{tel}, #{regdate} )
mapper.delete: delete from TB_E601CALL where actcd not in (select actcd from TB_E601CALL_01 )
delete from TB_E601CALL_01 where actcd = #{actcd} and seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq, callbackflag, substring (callbacktime,0,3) + ':' + substring(callbacktime,3,3) as callbacktime , substring(calldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(calldate, 7,2) as calldate, callbackmemo, callnm, callnum, substring (calltime,0,3) + ':' + substring(calltime,3,3) as calltime, callmemo FROM tb_callmain WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ISNULL(callbackflag,'') Like concat('%',#{callbackflag},'%') AND LEN(callbackflag) > 0 and len(isnull(callbacktime,'')) > 0 order by seq desc

SELECT A.actcd, B.seq, A.actmail, B.tel, A.remark FROM TB_E601CALL A WITH(NOLOCK), TB_E601CALL_01 B WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.actcd = B.actcd and ( ISNULL(A.actmail,'') Like concat('%',#{actmail},'%') or ISNULL(B.tel,'') Like concat('%',#{actmail},'%') ) order by A.actmail
